mapper.update: UPDATE attendance SET EndTime = #{param3}, AttendanceStatus = CASE WHEN '18:00:00' >= EndTime THEN IF(AttendanceStatus LIKE '%정상출근%', AttendanceStatus, CONCAT( AttendanceStatus , '/조퇴')) ELSE IF(AttendanceStatus LIKE '%지각%', AttendanceStatus, CONCAT(AttendanceStatus, '/정상퇴근')) END WHERE userid = #{param1} AND date = #{param2};
mapper.select: SELECT employees.*, attendance.AttendanceID, attendance.Date, attendance.StartTime, attendance.EndTime, attendance.AttendanceStatus, attendance.OvertimeHours, attendance.VacationType, attendance.Remarks, departments.DepartmentName FROM employees INNER JOIN attendance ON employees.Userid = attendance.userid INNER JOIN departments ON employees.DepartmentID = departments.DepartmentID;

SELECT employees.*, attendance.AttendanceID, attendance.Date, attendance.StartTime, attendance.EndTime, attendance.AttendanceStatus, attendance.OvertimeHours, attendance.VacationType, attendance.Remarks,departments.DepartmentName FROM employees INNER JOIN attendance ON employees.Userid = attendance.userid INNER JOIN departments ON employees.DepartmentID = departments.DepartmentID ORDER BY CASE WHEN Name COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci REGEXP '^[가-힣]' THEN 1 WHEN Name COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci REGEXP '^[A-Za-z]' THEN 2 WHEN Name COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci REGEXP '^[0-9]' THEN 3 ELSE 4 END, Name COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci;

SELECT employees.*, attendance.AttendanceID, attendance.Date, attendance.StartTime, attendance.EndTime, attendance.AttendanceStatus, attendance.OvertimeHours, attendance.VacationType, attendance.Remarks, departments.DepartmentName FROM employees INNER JOIN attendance ON employees.Userid = attendance.userid INNER JOIN departments ON employees.DepartmentID = departments.DepartmentID ORDER BY CASE WHEN Date COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci REGEXP '^[가-힣]' THEN 1 WHEN Date COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci REGEXP '^[A-Za-z]' THEN 2 WHEN Date COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci REGEXP '^[0-9]' THEN 3 ELSE 4 END, STR_TO_DATE(Date, '%Y-%m-%d') DESC;
